Uses of Interface
fr.upmc.components.connectors.ConnectorI

  • Packages that use ConnectorI 
    Package Description
    fr.upmc.components.connectors
    Hierarchy of connector objects to assemble components.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.basic_cs
    Basic client/server example In this example, a basic client/server is constructed.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.ddeployment_cs.connectors  
    fr.upmc.components.examples.reflection.connectors  
    fr.upmc.components.ports
    Hierarchy of ports to expose interfaces of components and interconnect them.
    fr.upmc.components.pre.dcc.connectors  
    fr.upmc.components.reflection.connectors  

    • Uses of ConnectorI in fr.upmc.components.connectors

      Subinterfaces of ConnectorI in fr.upmc.components.connectors 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DataConnectorI
      The interface BasicDataConnectorI is the generic interface for connectors that mediate between requiring and offering components that exchange data rather than calling services from each others.
      interface  DataTwoWayConnectorI
      The interface DataTwoWayConnectorI is the generic interface for connectors that mediate between requiring and offering components that exchange data rather than calling services from each others, but using the same interface on both sides and act as peers in the exchange.
      interface  TwoWayConnectorI
      The interface TwoWayConnectorI is the generic interface for connectors that mediate between components exposing two-way interfaces.
      Classes in fr.upmc.components.connectors that implement ConnectorI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractConnector
      The class AbstractConnector partially implements an abstract connector between two components by assuming that the offering component implements the offered interface.
      class  AbstractDataConnector
      The class AbstractDataConnector partially implements a basic data connector between components exchanging data rather than calling each others services.
      class  AbstractDataTwoWayConnector
      The class AbstractDataTwoWayConnector partially implements a basic data connector between components exchanging data in a peer to peer way rather than calling each others services.
      class  AbstractTwoWayConnector
      The class AbstractTwoWayConnector partially implements a basic connector between components calling each others services in a peer to peer way rather than in a client-provider relationship.
      class  ActiveDataConnector
      The class ActiveBasicDataConnector partially implements an active connector that can be used to connect qctive components in a synchronised way, on a mix of active and passive components using a full or partial pull mode.
      class  DataConnector
      The class DataConnector partially implements a basic data connector where components call each others using plain Java method calls only.
      class  DataTwoWayConnector
      The class DataTwoWayConnector implements a standard connector for components exchanging data in a peer-to-peer mode using standard data two-way interfaces.
      Methods in fr.upmc.components.connectors that return ConnectorI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected ConnectorI AbstractConnector.thisConnector() 
      Methods in fr.upmc.components.connectors with parameters of type ConnectorI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ConnectionBuilder.connectWith(java.lang.String serverPortURI, java.lang.String clientPortURI, ConnectorI connector)
      connects two components through the named port (using port URI).
      void ConnectionBuilder.disconnectWith(java.lang.String serverPortURI, java.lang.String clientPortURI, ConnectorI connector)
      disconnects two components that were previously connected through the two ports which URIs are given as parameters, and the connector also given as parameter.
      void ConnectorI.obeyConnection(PortI sender, ConnectorI connector)
      transmits the connection request to the other port.
      void AbstractConnector.obeyConnection(PortI sender, ConnectorI connector) 

    • Uses of ConnectorI in fr.upmc.components.examples.basic_cs

      Classes in fr.upmc.components.examples.basic_cs that implement ConnectorI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  URIServiceConnector
      The class URIServiceConnector implements a connector between the URIConsumerI and the URIProviderI interfaces.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  URIConsumerLaunchConnector
      The class URIConsumerLaunchConnector implements the connector to call the task.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MyServiceConnector
      The class MyServiceConnector implements the connector for the MyServiceI interface.

    • Uses of ConnectorI in fr.upmc.components.ports

      Methods in fr.upmc.components.ports that return ConnectorI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConnectorI OutboundPortI.getConnector()
      returns the connector to which this port is attached, and null if none.
      ConnectorI DataInboundPortI.getConnector()
      returns the connector to which this port is attached, and null if none.

      Methods in fr.upmc.components.ports with parameters of type ConnectorI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PortI.doConnection(java.lang.String otherPortURI, ConnectorI connector)
      connect the port where the owner is calling its port to initiate the connection.
      void AbstractTwoWayPort.doConnection(java.lang.String otherPortURI, ConnectorI connector) 
      void AbstractOutboundPort.doConnection(java.lang.String otherPortURI, ConnectorI connector)
      Contract pre otherPortURI !
      void AbstractInboundPort.doConnection(java.lang.String otherPortURI, ConnectorI connector) 
      void AbstractDataOutboundPort.doConnection(java.lang.String otherPortURI, ConnectorI connector) 
      void AbstractDataInboundPort.doConnection(java.lang.String otherPortURI, ConnectorI connector)
      Contract pre otherPortURI !
      void PortI.obeyConnection(java.lang.String otherPortURI, ConnectorI connector)
      connect when the other component is the initiator of the connection or called by the owner after it has requested the connection from the other component.
      void AbstractTwoWayPort.obeyConnection(java.lang.String otherPortURI, ConnectorI connector) 
      void AbstractOutboundPort.obeyConnection(java.lang.String otherPortURI, ConnectorI connector)
      Contract pre otherPortURI !
      void AbstractInboundPort.obeyConnection(java.lang.String otherPortURI, ConnectorI connector) 
      void AbstractDataOutboundPort.obeyConnection(java.lang.String otherPortURI, ConnectorI connector)
      Contract pre otherPortURI !
      void AbstractDataInboundPort.obeyConnection(java.lang.String otherPortURI, ConnectorI connector)
      Contract pre otherPortURI !
      void OutboundPortI.setConnector(ConnectorI c)
      set the connector of the port, establishing the connection with a provider.
      void AbstractTwoWayPort.setConnector(ConnectorI c)
      Contract pre true // no precondition.
      void AbstractOutboundPort.setConnector(ConnectorI c) 
      void AbstractDataOutboundPort.setConnector(ConnectorI c) 
      void OutboundPortI.unsetConnector(ConnectorI c)
      unset the connector of the port, cutting the connection with a provider.
      void AbstractTwoWayPort.unsetConnector(ConnectorI c)
      Contract pre c !
